Health & Wellness Coaching

Now accepting one-on-one and group clients

You want to take control of your health but...

You have a strong family history of chronic disease, such as cancer or heart disease, and are worried that you're at risk too You're confused about what types of changes you can make to your lifestyle to improve your health You're on a handful of medications, all with a list of side-effects, and desperately want to get off as many as you can You're going through or have been through cancer treatment and want to manage treatment-related side effects and prevent recurrence or other types of cancer

Good news! You have the power to make dramatic changes in your health and vitality and to reduce your heart disease and cancer risk. Are you ready to make a long-lasting investment towards your health? Let's start the adventure!

Program Options:

All of my programs entail individualized plans, personalized handouts, virtual pantry clean-up, recipes, e-mail support between sessions, and progress tracking.

I offer a free 30-minute discovery call to review your health goals and to discuss which, if any, program is right for you. No commitment required- it is important for us to be the right fit for each other!

Everybody is different, so my packages are customizable to suit your individual needs. Prices vary based on the plan we build. Monthly payment plans available.

1) Customizable individual coaching: Whether you feel super motivated to dedicate time to your health and you know how to hold yourself accountable, but just need some help sorting through all that confounding nutrition information or you need a serious jumpstart and have no clue where to start, I meet you where you are and we create a plan together.

2) Customizable group and corporate sessions: ideal for a group of friends or family with similar health goals or for companies dedicated to the health and wellness of their employees. All program sessions are conducted via audio and video platforms.

3)Customized weekly meal suggestions: Add on to any coaching program

Are you ready to dig deep and bring a more energized, healthier you to the surface? I'm ready to answer questions or to arrange a free 30-minute discovery call (no commitment required) when you are. Treat yo' self, you deserve it.

Bibliography

1) Mosesso, K., Wein, R. (2012, September). Midline Carcinoma with NUT rearrangement: A case report. Poster presented at: AAO-HNSF 2012 Annual Meeting and OTO EXPO, Washington, DC.

2) Mosesso, K., Wein. R., O’Leary, M., Von Euw, E. Tracheostomy Management Made Simple for the Head and Neck Cancer Patient. Spokane: Provenir Publishing; 2014.

3) Mosesso, K. (2015, November). Evaluation and Management of Late and Long-term Treatment Related Effects in Adult Allogeneic Hematopoietic Stem Cell Transplant Survivors. American Journal of Nursing. 115(11):22-34

4) Mosesso, K. (2017, May). Reach Beyond Fear and Learn to Live Life as an Authentic Adventure. Transformation Coaching Magazine, 10. Retrieved from: http://www.transformationmag.com/online/emags/Transformation_0517s.pdf

5) Mosesso, K., Walters, C., Supan, C., Jakubowski, J. (2018, February). Assessing the feasibility of developing and implementing a web-based patient education app. Poster presented at: ASCO Survivorship Symposium, Orlando, FL.

Web Development

Kara completed a web development and coding bootcamp at The Institute of Code where she learned html, CSS and Javascript. She utilizes her web development and extensive health and wellness knowledge for front-end development of websites for burgeoning health and wellness entrepreneurs. She designed and developed this site.
